code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import appReducers from'./reducers/index';var ReduxStore=function ReduxStore(){var composeEnhancers=typeof window!=='undefined'&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(appReducers,composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk)));return store;};export default ReduxStore;
